TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PersonalizationDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type PersonalizationDictionary = class interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装基本验证规则，这些规则指示是在 还是 范围内将一段自定义数据视为可个性化。

span.span: Encapsulates basic validation rules that indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in either or scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例是一系列对象，包含个性化设置范围和对象值。A instance is a collection of objects, which consist of a personalization scope and an object value. 这些条目分配中的键对象。These entries are assigned a key in the object. 较好的做法是将所有属性都添加到字典使用方法，而不考虑在页面范围。A good practice is to add all properties to the dictionary using the method, regardless of the scope of the page. .NET Framework 会将信息保存在适当的方式;例如，在页面时保存共享的数据作用域。The .NET Framework saves the information in the appropriate way; for example, shared data is saved when the page is in scope. 但是，正在保存 Web 部件值时，不会保存共享的属性，在页处于作用域，并控件添加了中的页作用域。However, shared properties are not saved when a Web Parts value is being saved, the page is in scope, and the control was added with the page in scope.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 向个性化设置字典添加个性化设置项。

span.span: Adds personalization entries to the personalization dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用此方法，将放置到状态对象的自定义状态信息的多个功能并指定 state 值关联的范围。You can call this method, place various pieces of custom state information into the state object, and specify the scope associated with the state value. 当控件处于作用域，可以添加与相关联的名称和状态信息作用域或作用域。When a control is in scope, you can add name and state information that is associated with either scope or scope. 在中作用域，您可以添加仅与关联的名称和状态信息作用域。In scope, you can add name and state information associated only with scope. 很好的做法，但是，若要将所有属性都添加到字典使用包括具有的属性或作用域，而不考虑在页面范围。It is a good practice, however, to add all properties to the dictionary using including properties with or scope, regardless of the scope of the page. .NET Framework 仅保存与属性范围限定在适当的时候。The .NET Framework only saves the properties with scope when appropriate. 换而言之，共享属性不会保存时中最初添加的控件作用域更高版本在保存页处于作用域。In other words, shared properties are not saved when a control that was initially added in scope is later saved while the page is in scope. 在另一方案中，如果控件已添加到中的页页中时更高版本保存作用域和控件作用域，自定义共享的属性值保存 （以及自定义用户范围的属性）。In an opposite scenario, if a control was added to the page in scope, and the control is later saved while the page is in scope, custom shared property values are saved (along with custom user-scoped properties). 会影响页的个性化设置范围的个性化设置数据的详细信息和如何共享和用户范围的属性，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)主题。For details on personalization data and how shared and user-scoped properties are affected by the personalization scope of the page, see the [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320) topic. 与任何集合一样，此方法按 1 递增集合计数，并且集合上当前处于活动状态的任何枚举数应会失效。As with any collection, this method increments the collection count by one and any enumerators currently active on the collection should be invalidated.

summary.span: 移除所有来自当前 对象的自定义状态信息。

span.span: Removes all custom state information from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将清除从当前的所有自定义状态信息对象。This method clears all custom state information from the current object. 对的集合，当前处于活动状态的任何枚举数应会失效。Any enumerators currently active against the collection should be invalidated. 若要删除的个性化设置字典中只有特定的个性化设置项，请使用方法。To remove only a specific personalization entry in a personalization dictionary, use the method. 请注意在空的个性化设置字典上调用此方法不会引发错误。Note that calling this method on an empty personalization dictionary does not raise an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性适用于对象，表示由标识的自定义个性化设置信息`key`参数。This property works with a object representing custom personalization information that is identified by the `key` parameter. 如果不存在的值`key`，`null`返回。If there is no value for `key`, `null` is returned. 如果`key`尚不存在，然后`key`（和其关联的值） 添加到字典。If `key` does not already exist, then `key` (and its associated value) are added to the dictionary. 请注意，可以将 null 值添加到字典中，索引器还可用于更新的个性化设置值。Note that you can add a null value to the dictionary, and the indexer can also be used to update the personalization value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在内部，当删除自定义状态项，个性化设置字典的计数将减少 1。Internally, when you remove a custom state entry, the count of the personalization dictionary is decremented by one. 任何针对字典当前处于活动状态的枚举数应会失效。Any enumerators currently active against the dictionary should be invalidated. 如果尝试删除不存在的键，则会不发生任何错误。No error occurs if you attempt to remove a nonexistent key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查多个详细信息，以确保的有效性`value`和`key`然后再尝试将其添加到个性化设置字典。The method checks several details to ensure the validity of `value` and `key` before attempting to add them to the personalization dictionary. 如果检查都已成功，该方法会调用类的方法，并向它传递`key`和`value`参数。If the checks are successful, the method calls the class's own method, passing to it the `key` and `value` parameters.
